posts.post_content:
ALL SOLD.  THANKS!

Evening folks,

After a short stint of collecting various T206 Kelley backs, I've decided to move on.  Looking to free up some cash for a few other pursuits.  Feel free to make an offer.  Prices include shipping, PayPal is preferred, and I'm heading to the PO tomorrow anyway, so the stuff will be out quickly.

Email (richard@richardarmstrong.ca), PM or post.



Thanks for looking!

Regards,

Richard.

Thanks. Well packaged. Good transaction.

Best regards,

Joe
